bicycles.name: Trek Marlin 4 Matte Anthracite ATB 29 2022
bicycles.desc: Professional cross-country racing hardtail at Championship and World Cup level. The Scott Scale 700 RC features an ultralight HMX composite frame, Sram XX1/X01 1x11 racing transmission, Shimano XTR M9000 disc brakes, and racing Syncros XR RC wheels. Nino Schurter's choice for short-track cross-country.

bicycles.name: Specialized Rockhopper Sport 29 2022
bicycles.desc: Professional cross-country racing hardtail at Championship and World Cup level. The Scott Scale 700 RC features an ultralight HMX composite frame, Sram XX1/X01 1x11 racing transmission, Shimano XTR M9000 disc brakes, and racing Syncros XR RC wheels. Nino Schurter's choice for short-track cross-country.

bicycles.name: Giant Talon 3 27.5 2022
bicycles.desc: Ciclistino Commuter X - a reliable and stylish commuter bike for urban riders. Aluminum frame, Shimano Alfine 8-speed internal hub, hydraulic disc brakes, and Schwalbe Marathon tires. Offers a smooth and efficient commute in city environments.

Nino Schurter's choice for short-track cross-country.

bicycles.name: Roww X1 2022
bicycles.desc: Mountain bike BMC Fourstroke 01 XTR - an outstanding cross-country hardtail. Lightweight aluminum frame, Shimano XTR M9100 1x12 transmission, Shimano XTR M9100 disc brakes, and racing DT Swiss XRC 1501 wheels. An excellent choice for races and training.

bicycles.name: Bianchi Oltre XR4 Disc 2022
bicycles.desc: Ciclistino Commuter X - a reliable and stylish commuter bike for urban riders. Aluminum frame, Shimano Alfine 8-speed internal hub, hydraulic disc brakes, and Schwalbe Marathon tires. Offers a smooth and efficient commute in city environments.

bicycles.name: Bianchi Methanol 9.1 CV FS 29 2022
bicycles.desc: Mountain bike BMC Fourstroke 01 XTR - an outstanding cross-country hardtail. Lightweight aluminum frame, Shimano XTR M9100 1x12 transmission, Shimano XTR M9100 disc brakes, and racing DT Swiss XRC 1501 wheels. An excellent choice for races and training.

bicycles.name: BMC Roadmachine 01 Four 2022
bicycles.desc: Ciclistino Commuter X - a reliable and stylish commuter bike for urban riders. Aluminum frame, Shimano Alfine 8-speed internal hub, hydraulic disc brakes, and Schwalbe Marathon tires. Offers a smooth and efficient commute in city environments.

bicycles.name: Ciclistino Gravel G1 2022
bicycles.desc: Mountain bike BMC Fourstroke 01 XTR - an outstanding cross-country hardtail. Lightweight aluminum frame, Shimano XTR M9100 1x12 transmission, Shimano XTR M9100 disc brakes, and racing DT Swiss XRC 1501 wheels. An excellent choice for races and training.

bicycles.name: Roww XC2 2022
bicycles.desc: Ciclistino Commuter X - a reliable and stylish commuter bike for urban riders. Aluminum frame, Shimano Alfine 8-speed internal hub, hydraulic disc brakes, and Schwalbe Marathon tires. Offers a smooth and efficient commute in city environments.

bicycles.name: Scott Speedster 20 Disc 2022
bicycles.desc: Mountain bike BMC Fourstroke 01 XTR - an outstanding cross-country hardtail. Lightweight aluminum frame, Shimano XTR M9100 1x12 transmission, Shimano XTR M9100 disc brakes, and racing DT Swiss XRC 1501 wheels. An excellent choice for races and training.

bicycles.name: Trek Domane AL 2 2022
bicycles.desc: Gravel bike Ciclistino G2 Gravel Pro - the perfect choice for travel and gravel riding. Carbon frame, SRAM Force 1x11 transmission, hydraulic disc brakes SRAM Force, and reliable DT Swiss G 1800 wheels. Stylish and high-performing gravel bike.

bicycles.name: Canyon Grail AL 7 2022
bicycles.desc: Mountain bike Colnago Master - a classic hardtail for versatile off-road adventures. Steel frame, Shimano Deore 1x10 transmission, mechanical disc brakes, and durable Colnago Artemis wheels. Ideal for trail exploration and casual riding.

bicycles.name: Specialized Stumpjumper Comp Carbon 29 2022
bicycles.desc: Specialized Roubaix Comp - a high-performance road bike designed for endurance. FACT 10r carbon frame, Shimano Ultegra R8020 hydraulic disc brakes, and Roval C 38 Disc wheels. Smooth and efficient, ideal for long-distance rides and challenging terrains.

bicycles.name: Orbea Gain M20i 2022
bicycles.desc: Cipollini MCM Allroad - a versatile gravel bike for those seeking adventure. Carbon frame, SRAM Rival 1x11 transmission, hydraulic disc brakes, and Mavic Allroad Elite wheels. Offers stability and comfort on various surfaces, perfect for exploration.

bicycles.name: BMC Teammachine SLR01 One 2022
bicycles.wheels: DT Swiss PRC 1100 DICUT 35 Mon Chasseral
bicycles.desc: Roww Enduro Pro - a high-performance enduro mountain bike built for aggressive trails. Aluminum frame, SRAM GX Eagle 1x12 transmission, hydraulic disc brakes, and RockShox Yari RC fork. Designed for downhill speed and trail domination.

bicycles.name: Ciclistino Aero G2 2022
bicycles.desc: Bianchi Oltre XR4 - an aerodynamic road bike for speed enthusiasts. Carbon frame, Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 electronic shifting, hydraulic disc brakes, and Fulcrum Wind 40 DB wheels. Unparalleled performance for those chasing podium finishes.

bicycles.name: Colnago C60 Italia Disc 2022
bicycles.desc: Ciclistino Commuter X - a reliable and stylish commuter bike for urban riders. Aluminum frame, Shimano Alfine 8-speed internal hub, hydraulic disc brakes, and Schwalbe Marathon tires. Offers a smooth and efficient commute in city environments.

bicycles.name: Bianchi Methanol CV FS 9.2 2022
bicycles.desc: Ciclistino Commuter X - a reliable and stylish commuter bike for urban riders. Aluminum frame, Shimano Alfine 8-speed internal hub, hydraulic disc brakes, and Schwalbe Marathon tires. Offers a smooth and efficient commute in city environments.

bicycles.name: Roww Gravel X3 2022
bicycles.desc: Trek Domane AL 3 - a versatile road bike for entry-level cyclists. Alpha Aluminum frame, Shimano Claris 2x8-speed transmission, rim brakes, and Bontrager Affinity Disc wheels. Perfect for long rides and road cycling exploration.

bikeParts.name: Mavic Cosmic Pro Carbon UST Wheelset
Shimano Ultegra Di2 RD-R8050 Rear Derailleur

blogPosts.title: Extreme Mountain bike driving
blogPosts.bannerDesc: Pinarello's new Dogma F is a lighter, more responsive and aerodynamic version of their latest F12 road racing motorcycle. And while the overall asymmetrical aerodynamic profile remains definitely familiar with the decades-old Pinarello Dogma curves, the biggest surprise may be that it's not just about the disc brake. While many bicycle manufacturers only use disc brakes, Pinarello professionals continue to win Grand Tours on bicycles with rim brakes, so Dogma F continues to evolve with both rim and disc brakes…

postContent.contentTitle: 2022 Pinarello Dogma F изогнутый аэродинамический шоссейный гоночный велосипед из карбона
postContent.desc: The shape of the new Pinarello Dogma F road aerodynamic bike does not differ much from the previous Dogma, except for a flatter top and slightly more lowered seat feathers. But interestingly, the license plate has been changed from the most recent Dogma F12 to this new seventh-generation Dogma F, which, according to Pinarello, simplifies the connection of motorcycles with its long past (since 2000) and its 'irrefutable' superiority stretching into the future.

postContent.contentTitle: 2022 Pinarello Dogma F изогнутый аэродинамический шоссейный гоночный велосипед из карбона

blogPosts.title: Pinarello's new Dogma
blogPosts.bannerDesc: Pinarello's new Dogma F is a lighter, more responsive and aerodynamic version of their latest F12 road racing motorcycle. And while the overall asymmetrical aerodynamic profile remains definitely familiar with the decades-old Pinarello Dogma curves, the biggest surprise may be that it's not just about the disc brake. While many bicycle manufacturers only use disc brakes, Pinarello professionals continue to win Grand Tours on bicycles with rim brakes, so Dogma F continues to evolve with both rim and disc brakes…
